resources.string: This is the main view. The newest articles are pictured below. Tap an article to view the details.
Tap the link or the button to go to the article mentioned. Unless you\'re already looking at a favourite, press the favourite button to favourite the article to save to look at later.
This is your article favourites list. From here, you can go to and tap any article to view it. Press and hold on a favourite to delete it."
This is the about page. You can save a message here, which is saved using Android\'s SharedPreferences. Have some fun!
